attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beleive that there should be free wi-fi throughout the nation to benefit the busness world, this would mean that all wi-fi laptops would be able to connect to the internet wirelessly anywhere they go. But laptops are not the only devices which would benefit from this, gaming devices such as the sony psp and nintendo ds use wi-fi and there are now mobile phones that use wi-fi.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
